landing page subslogan 1: Create self-contained snapshots for every bookmark you save
landing page subslogan 2: Access and share previously visited pages without worrying about modifications or availability
landing page ext desc: Browser extensions are required to create bookmarks. Install the extension to your browser and enjoy Omnoming.
experimental feature: This is an experimental feature, always check the output
title: Title
assign account data: Assign username and e-mail address to your account
add tag tip: Add tags to your bookmarks to be able to efficiently filter
filtering tip: Check out the search functionality on the Bookmark listing for full text search and advanced filtering
find snapshots by domain or url: Find snapshots by domain or URL
landing feature 2 desc: Your snapshots remain accessible even if the original website goes offline
landing feature 3 desc: Create collections, add tags, and organize bookmarks into projects that make sense to you
landing subslogan 3 title: Everything you need to save and organize the web
landing subslogan 3 desc: Omnom combines the simplicity of bookmarking with the reliability of web archiving
landing feature 4 desc: Share bookmarks with everyone even in the Fediverse
landing feature 5 desc: Find any bookmark instantly with full-text search across all your saved content
landing feature 6 desc: Quickly identify changes on a website since last visit
